content.title: ALPHA TESTERS GETTING ACCESS TODAY! READ TO FIND OUT HOW TO GET LOOP!
content.creator:
James Pi√±eiro
February 1, 2025
content.content:
HELLO EVERYONE! Today is the day that Loop will be sent out to Alpha Testers! This is the absolute earliest version of the app, and just about everything is open to change. If you are an alpha tester, I will send you a message sometime today with more information about how to get Loop on your device immediately. Apple users please check your inboxes, and if you don't have Loop on your device by 10 AM EST tomorrow please contact me immediately. I'll start sending out the links around 5-6PM EST.
Android users will receive it either today or tomorrow, depending on how seamless the process is for the play store. Please check your emails and contact me if you don't receive it by Sunday at 10 AM EST.
While in testing mode: I will be updating the app every 1-2 days, so make sure to keep up to date with the latest version as I am actively changing things pretty much around the clock. I will be dedicating my whole weekend to improving the Loop experience, and responding to Alpha tester advice/recommendations.
Thank you all for everything, talk to you soon.

content.title: ON THE APP STORE IN THE NEXT WEEK! LIKELY RELEASE DATE REVEALED! HUGE UI REVAMP! COLORFUL!!!!!!
content.creator:
James Pi√±eiro
January 3, 2025
content.content:
Introduction
Hello everyone! My sincerest of apologies for the gap since my last update. I had two weeks of finals, and then the last two weeks I've honestly just been adding a lot of features to try and push Loop onto the app store for preorder. Unfortunately getting it on the app store has been a tedious process, but I believe Loop should be available for preorder on the app store within the next week or so, with Google Play Store following soon after. My initial plan was to wait until it was available on the app store to update you all, but it has been a while and I want to keep you guys - wait for it - IN THE LOOP!!!
Additions in the last two weeks
Revamped the whole entire UI, with the exception of the core parts of the homepage (New settings page will be the first five pictures down below)
Added a nice bottom tab page for navigating all three primary sections of the app
Within the settings page, added the 12 primary and 12 secondary themes, allowing for 144 different themes with more to come
Added a timer so you can see when your loop is going to refresh
Added an "informed days" system, where the more days you log on the more themes you get and more.
Revamped the signup/login page (will be the sixth picture down below, seventh will be the old one)
Began working on the Explore page, which will likely be where most people spend most of their time on the app. This is very WIP but I absolutely LOVE it so far! I won't have a photo of it until next update though.
Got rid of the big buttons on the home page, now I have a beautiful little tab thingy on the bottom (Will be the eighth and 9th pictures down below)
Added basically all the data collection so now every account has different saves, interests, themes, etc. Basically, your loop is now YOUR LOOP!
Much more is on the way, I just can't wait to get it on the dang app store so I can start PUSHING marketing!
What is coming next
In the next two weeks, you can expect:
LOOP ON THE APP STORE FOR PRE-ORDER!! (Likely in the next week)
Explore page will be done (You still don't really know what it is yet, but it's awesome)
ALPHA testers, you will be able to DOWNLOAD LOOP ON YOUR DEVICE!!
At least one more update from me with more information!
App release date
Right now, it's looking like Loop will either release late January, or February 1st. I will not let it take any longer than that. Make sure to join the waitlist at www.getloop.tech ASAP to know when you can download the app, and alpha and beta testers especially as you will get the app sooner than anyone else!
Photos (There's also some more text near the bottom, but you should check out the photos first)
^^ Current settings page (ALL PRONE TO CHANGE. ALSO I HAVE A FEW OTHER SETTINGS I STILL WANT TO ADD (I wanna add a button that takes you into a deeper settings where you can set blocked news sources, push notifications, etc.))
^^^ New sign up / log in page (I'll have apple and google sign in too)
^^^ This was the old sign up/log in page (Much worse, way too wordy.)
^^^ At the bottom you can see the new delete, add notifications, and add interest UI. It's much simpler and doesn't take up nearly as much of the screen.
^^^ This was the old UI way back when the app was literally just the home page. See how much space the buttons are taking up? Boom!! 
Wrap-up
If you actually read all of this or even skimmed through half of this, I am thoroughly impressed. If you read all of this or even skimmed through half of this and you aren't my mom or related to me, I am even more impressed. Have a wonderful day, the next update will come much sooner, apologies for the gap.
P.S. There's a black and white theme as well if you'd rather not have a super colorful interface. MUCH MORE COMING SOON!!!

content.title: EXTRA REWARD TO ALL TIERS! APP CUSTOMIZATION! WEBSITE! SOCIAL MEDIAS CREATED! FIRST UPDATE!!
content.creator:
James Pi√±eiro
November 17, 2024
content.content:
First Update!
Hey everybody! I have a few updates about Loop, and will be updating you guys about once every 1-2 weeks regarding the development process.
The Loop Website, getloop.tech has been released!
It features a nice overview of the app, provides socials, answers some of the most common questions I get regarding the app, and allows you to test themes that you'll be able to use in the app. Speaking of which..
Beautiful App Themes!
I've decided a great idea to add customization to Loop is to have custom colors and themes! I have just a few previewed on the website, so you can check some out there:
(I just noticed the top right corner of the loop cuts off, whoops I'll fix that ASAP!)
How Can You Get These Themes?
These themes will be unlocked on Loop by staying informed and checking the news often (Not multiple days in a row or streaks or any gross, stress-inducing practices like that. It will be total number of days you check the news on Loop). But, if you support on Kickstarter, you'll notice that each backer tier has a different color (Example: $5 has a green background). You will automatically get the theme of whatever supporter tier you are (And all of the tiers below yours) when the app is released, so you will get a head start on customizing your Loop!
What I've Been Working On, What I will Be Working On:
Since I launched this Kickstarter a few days ago, I have created the whole getloop.tech website, and created an Instagram and YouTube for Loop.
My next goal is to create a solid short marketing video to post on @joinloop on Instagram, and TikTok once I make a TikTok for Loop, and YouTube shorts and LinkedIn as well. After that, my first course of action is to add the Loop animations to the app, and make the overall app more responsive and customizable.
Conclusion
Firstly, thank you so much for reading this all! There are 25 of you and I appreciate all of you so much. I'm sure there's only like 1 or 2 who read this whole thing and you're definitely related to me if you did, so thank you so much for your continuous support. Stay tuned for my next update in one to two weeks, I look forward to keeping you all in the Loop.
